lst.name: sentence
lst.str: This was despite a proposed correction of Britain's budget contribution to reflect its inability to take full advantage of the EC's farm subsidies system because of the relatively small size of its agricultural sector.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Analysis by officials and diplomats of proposals released yesterday by the EC's executive Commission showed their full impact, were they in force this year, would have left Britain worse off by 545 mln European Currency Units.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Diplomats said although other nations such as Italy, Belgium and the Netherlands were certain to oppose elements in the system which could also substantially increase their own EC payments, the main opposition was expected from Britain.

lst.name: sentence
